item.title: CVE-2022-36771|2024-08-03T10:14:28.476Z -- ibm -- qradar%20user%20behavior%20analytics
item.description: IBM QRadar User Behavior Analytics could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information from that they should not have access to. IBM X-Force ID: 232791.
